text: Anthony Dean Rodham (August 8, 1954 â€“ June 7, 2019)"First Lady Biography: Hillary Clinton" . National First Ladies' Library. Accessed via Google cache July 10, 2007. was an American consultant and businessman. He was the youngest brother of Hillary Rodham Clinton, and the brother-in-law of former U.S. President Bill Clinton. During the Hillary Clinton presidential campaign, 2016, he and Hugh appeared with her at a rally in their childhood summer home of Scranton, Pennsylvania in April 2016. He kept a low profile during the campaign. Rodham died on June 7, 2019 at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American political commentators Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Category:Hillary Rodham Clinton
title: Tony Rodham
